crisis.title: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
crisis.description: 24/7 free and confidential support for people in distress. Trained counselors provide immediate crisis intervention.

crisis.title: Crisis Text Line
crisis.description: Text-based crisis support with trained volunteers. Available via text message for those who prefer written communication.

crisis.title: SAMHSA National Helpline
crisis.description: Free, confidential treatment referral and information service for mental health and substance use disorders.

high.title: Local Mental Health Services
high.description: Professional mental health counselors and therapists in your area who can provide ongoing support.

high.title: Employee Assistance Programs
high.description: Many employers offer free, confidential counseling services for employees and their families.

high.title: Community Mental Health Centers
high.description: Community-based mental health services often offer sliding scale fees and comprehensive care.

moderate.title: Support Groups
moderate.description: Peer support groups for various mental health challenges, both in-person and virtual options.

moderate.title: Mental Health Apps
moderate.description: Evidence-based apps for meditation, mood tracking, and cognitive behavioral therapy techniques.

moderate.title: University Counseling Centers
moderate.description: Most colleges and universities offer free or low-cost mental health services for students.

low.title: Wellness Programs
low.description: Local wellness programs, yoga classes, and stress management workshops in your community.

low.title: Library Resources
low.description: Many libraries offer mental health resources, quiet spaces, and community programs.

low.title: Religious/Spiritual Communities
low.description: Faith-based communities often provide counseling, support groups, and spiritual guidance.

safe.title: Online Mental Health Education
safe.description: Reputable sources for learning about mental health, wellness strategies, and self-care techniques.

safe.title: Mindfulness and Meditation Resources
safe.description: Guided meditation, mindfulness practices, and relaxation techniques for daily wellness.

safe.title: Fitness and Recreation Centers
safe.description: Physical activity programs, group fitness classes, and recreational activities that support mental wellness.
